item.title: Publishing Data to the Web with Heroku and Datasette
item.description: Please note that this course website is equipped with the Hypothes.is annotation layer. If these instructions are unclear, or I’ve forgotten something crucial, let me know: please highlight the relevant text and leave an annotation in our class Hypothesis group to alert me. Prerequisites You need to have the following installed on your machine: Python. I recommend using Anaconda to manage all of your python related work. Get Anaconda here and get the 3.
